definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: Most managers attempt to influence employee motivation using both positive and negative approaches.
sentences.chinese: 大多数经理试图正负双法并举，激发员工的积极性。

sentences.english: As far as the writing technique is concerned, the Tang poetry combined realism and romanticism.
sentences.chinese: 唐诗在创作方法上，现实主义与浪漫主义并举。

sentences.english: Comprehensively implement the party’s education policy, teaching, education simultaneously Friday.
sentences.chinese: 全面贯彻执行党的教育方针，教书育人，五育并举。

sentences.english: Prof. LIU Lan-lin treated acne from the treatment of Blood Aspect, and explained this by cases.
sentences.chinese: 刘兰林教授从血分论治痤疮经验，并举案例说明。

sentences.english: Professor Zhang's empirical prescription "Anshen Decoction"is introduced, and one representative case is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍其经验方安神汤，并举一则典型病例以说明。

sentences.english: Anti-terrorism and anti-hegemony have been a fundamental requirement in promoting the peace and development of the world.
sentences.chinese: 反恐与反霸并举是促进世界和平与发展的根本要求。

sentences.english: The driver lifted his hands off the wheel and held them up.
sentences.chinese: 司机的双手从方向盘上移开，并举了起来。

sentences.english: Both development and protection are employed in tourism industry development, taking notice of sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 在开发中，开发与保护应同时并举，注意可持续发展。

sentences.english: Here, "Reed, under the Textual Research on Reeds, " with "Xiao Ping, under the" simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 这里“苇下于雚”，可与“荓下于萧”并举。

sentences.english: In theory, mining is supposed to occur in concert with resource protection and economic development.
sentences.chinese: 理论上说，矿业应该与资源保护和经济发展并举。

sentences.english: Both enhancing the smelting intensity and lowing the coke rate are necessary.
sentences.chinese: 提高冶炼强度，应与降低焦比并举。

sentences.english: Comprehensively implement the party’s education policy， teaching， education simultaneously Friday.
sentences.chinese: 全面贯彻执行党的教育方针，教书育人，五育并举。

definition: to lay equal stress on/to pay equal attention to
lit. to paint holding two brushes (idiom); fig. to work on two tasks at the same time/to attack one problem from two angles at the same time
to put effort into sth/to try really hard
to go forward together (idiom); to undertake simultaneous tasks/going hand in hand
to proceed in parallel/side by side (of two processes, developments, thoughts etc)
to run in parallel without hindrance/not mutually exclusive/two processes can be implemented without conflict
an overall plan taking into account all factors
to try hard to/to strive to
